qas.question: What did Armenia declare a cease-fire to in 1994?
Since when has Armenia experienced a positive growth in their economy?
What is one of the newer sectors Armenia has in addition to agriculture?
What helped Armenia decrease inflation and create study growth in the economy?

context: Nevertheless, the government was able to make wide-ranging <a3_0>economic reforms<a3_0/> that paid off in dramatically lower inflation and steady growth. The 1994 cease-fire in the <a0_0>Nagorno-Karabakh conflict<a0_0/> has also helped the economy. Armenia has had strong economic growth since <a1_0>1995<a1_0/>, building on the turnaround that began the previous year, and inflation has been negligible for the past several years. New sectors, such as <a2_0>precious-stone processing<a2_0/> and jewellery making, information and communication technology, and even tourism are beginning to supplement more traditional sectors of the economy, such as agriculture.
